greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: T(n,k) = 1/k! * Sum_{i=0..k} (-1)^(k-i) *C(k,i) * A258219(n,i); triangle T(n,k), n>=0, 0<=k<=n, read by rows.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..140, flattened
maple: b:= proc(x, y, t, k) option remember; `if`(y>x or y<0, 0,
T:= (n, k)-> add(A(n, i)*(-1)^(k-i)*binomial(k, i), i=0..k)/k!:
mathematica: b[x_, y_, t_, k_] := b[x, y, t, k] = If[y>x || y<0, 0, If[x==0, 1, b[x-1, y - 1, False, k]*If[t, (x+k*y)/y, 1] + b[x-1, y+1, True, k]]]; A[n_, k_] := b[2*n, 0, False, k]; T [n_, k_] := Sum[A[n, i]*(-1)^(k-i)*Binomial[k, i], {i, 0, k}]/k!; Table[T[n, k], {n, 0, 10}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 20 2017, translated from Maple *)
xref: Main diagonal and lower diagonal give: A000012, A000384(n+1).
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, May 23 2015
